document.full_text: general motors co  plans to invest $2 billion at plants in eight states, including at a plant in toledo, ohio, that makes transmissions for small cars, the detroit news reported, citing sources.
document.title: gm to invest $2 billion in u.s. plants: reports
lines_and_colors: general motors co  plans to invest $2 billion at plants in eight states, including at a plant in toledo, ohio, that makes transmissions for small cars, the detroit news reported, citing sources.
